name: micro-services-example-graphql-kubernetes
description: Features: - Kubernetes ready (local and cloud) - API GateWay (GraphQL API with remote schema) - Auth microservice (REST API): NodeJS - User Microservice (GraphQL API): NodeJS - Posts Microservice (REST API): NodeJS - Comments Microservice (REST API): PHP Symfony

scripts.install-dev-all: cd ms-api-gateway && npm i && cd ../ms-auth && npm i && cd ../ms-comment && npm i && cd ../ms-post && npm i && cd ../ms-user && npm i

author: Corentin GIRAUD
